title: [This week in Britain. Don't shoot the pianist]
brief_description: A segment from ‘This Week in Britain’ discussing the work of the National Film Archive, a division of the British Film Institute, in collecting and preserving film for posterity. Explains the problems associated with storing nitrate film, the procedures used for copying old film, and video taping.
